## Feature Summary
Brief description of the proposed feature.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this solve? What's the current limitation?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution, including:
- New type names and structure
- Relationship to existing types
- Utah DFCM standard alignment

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, such as:
- Related Utah DFCM standards documentation
- Example Xeto type definitions
- Impact on existing Utah libraries
- Example usage in Haxall projects
